item.description:
If you are an artist whose artwork is inspired by your dreams, please come Sept 14 and share your art with the group along with the dreams that inspired it. In anticipation of the Mystical Art & Talent Show (Oct 9), we will be hosting a show-and-tell Meetup about dream art. Whether you create dream art yourself or if you find it interesting, please come and hear what the artists have to say about their art. If you are a mystical artist interested in exhibiting in the Mystical Art & Talent Show please contact Carl.

We will also have some paper, pencils, pens, colored markers, and oil pastels on hand if you want draw a particular dream at the meeting. The art show in October will have an exhibit space set aside for images created in this Meetup. Participation is optional and you are under no obligation to exhibit what you create.

Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. Space is limited to 25 people. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend, to allow others to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel, please visit http://www.swedenborg...
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by the parking lot, up stairs, through hallway, left into parlor.
item.name: Art Inspired by Dreams
